column5: Have a good week folks and play nice I'm off to FLA in the next 12 hours or so for a week for fishing (when I can get out) and golf with the wife and kids.  Have fun and be safe while the ice melts on the lakes. Geoff
You just like to rub it in eh Have a great family trip GBW and be safe Leechman
You have a great time with the family! Don't forget the report!
If there is a report I sure will post about it. It might have to do with golf more then fishing as that's what they do down there...  Look out Tiger, here I come...  LOL
Not too sure you want to be saying that to him, Bud.
Oh man Roy... Just found out the kids post was just stocked with some bluegills.
Geoff, have a good trip! FLA sure beats Scugog Remember to post pictures when you are back!  - Will

Thanks Will.  I hope it's better, LOL! I just got the kids a new rod and reel as well (we had one here) and one for myself too for the panfish.  Yee haa, going softwater fishing in 2 days.... (first some golf)

For those that don't know me, I've got decent size "mit's" and use a LG/cadet glove.  Today I took the wife and kid's down to the kid's pond in FLA for some blue gill fishing.  It was a great day even though a nasty cold front and rain srorm blew in.  We fished for just under an hour and we landed a few fish and the bigest was the size on my hand with my fingers spread out.  Fish were caught on worms and micro tubes.  Next time I'll try and bring the camera...  cheers. Geoff

Hey all.  I hear your guys are getting better weather this week then I am, down in not so sunny FLA.  I found a really cool bait shop the other day called Anglers Outpost and Jim was a solid guy to deal with. He even gave my 1/2 price on a new spincast rod for my kids to use and a few free custom jigs. I sure didn't expect to get that kind of service when I was only spending $20 (not incl. kids rod) is his store.  I'm going to tie on one of those custom jigs later on this week and if they produce like he said they would for the blue gills then I'll be back to buy more as they should lay a beating on the crappie back home.  Well that's all for now, have a good one. Cheers.  Geoff
